short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organise your digital workplace with Squarl.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to login into Squarl, to see your collections and manage your bookmarks. If you are frequently use your browser, it is a great addition to your productivity.

In version 0.6.0 we updated our logo to Squarl Collections.

In version 0.5.0 we updated our logo.

In version 0.4.0 we show all items. When you click on a note, you will get redirected to the new item details view in Squarl.

In version 0.3.0 we added the ability to add the current webpage to your collection, open the collection in the Squarl web app, and open Microsoft Teams.
